long.title: Longest Call
msg: There's nothing here, you sure you work with HQ?
There is a button for ending the call, you know?
Gee, thanks for reminding us about the 'end call' button, we almost forgot it existed.
Nice try telling everyone the call disconnected, but I think we all know the truth. How very creative of you.
Well, aren't you just the champion of long calls, keeping everyone else on hold for all that time.

juicy.title: Juiciest Paycheck
msg: You gotta pump those numbers up
Wow, you must have been really desperate for money to request that much overtime. You requested it, ...right?
Did you request a crazy amount of OT, or you cheated? Either way you are a greedy human being
Wow, making more money than expected. How convenient. I'm sure it's just a huge coincidence and not at all suspicious.
Oh wow, making almost double as everyone else. I hope everything's okay, because that kind of success is just too good to be true.

ap.title: Personal Absences (AP) Time
msg: Wow, you must be a true model of reliability and responsibility, not taking a single unauthorized absence.
Oh, lucky you! So many AP's there, how did you manage to keep your job?
Well, aren't you just the model employee, with all those absent periods.
Oh, don't worry about the consequences of being absent. Keep skipping work, it'll only result in unemployment. Yay!

same.title: Calls received from same provider
msg: Oh boy, must be a slow day if you're not getting calls from the same number over and over again.
Oh, how convenient for you, getting all those calls from the same number. Must be nice to have a dedicated fan.
Wow, you must have made quite the impression for that number to keep calling you back, again and again.
Impressive, receiving so many calls from the same number, you must be a popular person.
